noun.description: (in the Roman Catholic Church) a member of a society of priests without vows, such as the Oratory of St. Philip Neri.
examples: Oratorians will pray together twice a day

adjective.description: Relating to or characteristic of a member of a society of priests without vows, such as the Oratory of St. Philip Neri.
examples: he wears his Oratorian collar and cassock
